DataElement.preferredName: Patient Crossover Study Initiation Occurrence Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Calendar date for a patients start on a crossover study, in which each subject receives the same series of treatments but in a random order that differs across study arms.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to patient being in a type of clinical study in which each study subject receives the same series of treatments but in a random order that differs across arms of the study._A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A type of clinical study in which each study subject receives the same series of treatments but in a random order that differs across arms of the study. Each subject serves as their own control in this type of study._The act of starting something; an act that sets in motion some course of events._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.:A type of clinical study in which each study subject receives the same series of treatments but in a random order that differs across arms of the study. Each subject serves as their own control in this type of study.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

A type of clinical study in which each study subject receives the same series of treatments but in a random order that differs across arms of the study. Each subject serves as their own control in this type of study.

Property.preferredDefinition: The act of starting something; an act that sets in motion some course of events.:Occurrence; an instance of something happening.

Concepts.definition: The act of starting something; an act that sets in motion some course of events.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

DataElementConcept.origin: ACOSOG CRF:American College of Surgeons Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Date as required for Clinical Trials Monitoring Service submissions.  Exchange format is YYYYMMDD.  Display format is DDMMMYYYY, with the month display the first three letters of each month (Jan, Feb, Mar, etc.).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/30/17 jk Transferred context, added CSI and reg status, released per Round 5 finalization task. --- Display and exchange formats are based on CTMS reporting requirements v.3.02 and all subsequent versions of these guidelines.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support the build of a Burkitts trial in MediData Rave; Released during draft new, retired and orphan content clean-up_11.27.18_ghd
DataElement.administrativeNotes: 3/10/23 added AQT for CCTG ticket number CADSR0002117 cjl.
